entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
